properties.description:
# General
For learning C++ you may take the free course [C++ For Programmers](https://www.udacity.com/course/c-for-programmers--ud210) at Udacity.

# Competitive Programming
You can include all headers at once as explained [here](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/bitsstdc-h-c/). There are also useful [builtin functions of the GCC compiler](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/builtin-functions-gcc-compiler/); GCC is most frequently used on various platforms.
